settings.name: label
settings.description: Optional header text for a dashboard or form

settings.name: description
settings.description: Text that displays beneath a dashboard or form

settings.name: isVisible
settings.description: Indicates if the dashboard is listed in the Dashboards listing in an app and the navigation menus for an app

settings.name: isDashboard
settings.description: Indicates if a view is a dashboard or a view implemented with advanced XML that is not a dashboard

settings.name: refresh
settings.description: Sets the dashboard refresh interval, in seconds. The dashboard reloads after the specified refresh interval

settings.name: cancelOnUnload
settings.description: Specifies whether to cancel search jobs when a user navigates away from a dashboard

settings.name: script
settings.description: Comma separated lists of custom scripts to load

settings.name: stylesheet
settings.description: Comma separated lists of custom stylesheets to load

settings.name: hideChrome
settings.description: When truthy the header and footer won't show up

settings.name: hideFilters
settings.description: When truthy the global fieldset will be hidden

settings.name: hideAppBar
settings.description: When truthy the app bar (nav) won't show up

settings.name: hideEdit
settings.description: When truthy the edit won't show up

settings.name: hideFooter
settings.description: When truthy the footer won't show up

settings.name: hideSplunkBar
settings.description: When truthy the splunk bar won't show up

settings.name: hideTitle
settings.description: When truthy the title won't show up

settings.name: title
settings.description: The element title as shown above the visualization
Show the link buttons at the bottom of the panel. Defaults to true
settings.name: link.visible
link.openSearch.visible
settings.description: Show the 'Open in Search' button at the bottom of the panel. Defaults to the value of link.visible

settings.name: link.openPivot.visible
settings.description: Show the 'Open in Pivot' button at the bottom of the panel. Defaults to the value of link.visible

settings.name: link.openSearch.text
settings.description: The label for the 'Open in Search' button. Defaults to 'Open in Search'

settings.name: link.openSearch.viewTarget
settings.description: The target view used when clicking on the 'Open in Search' button. Defaults to 'search'

settings.name: link.openSearch.search
settings.description: An alternative search to use when clicking on the 'Open in Search' button. Defaults to the search used by this panel
The earliest time to use for the alternative search specified by link.openSearch.search. Defaults to the earliest time used by this panel
settings.name: link.openSearch.searchEarliestTime
link.openSearch.searchLatestTime
settings.description: The latest time to use for the alternative search specified by link.openSearch.search. Defaults to the latest time used by this panel

settings.name: link.exportResults.visible
settings.description: Show the 'Export' button at the bottom of the panel. Defaults to the value of link.visible

settings.name: link.inspectSearch.visible
settings.description: Show the 'Inspect' button at the bottom of the panel. Defaults to the value of link.visible

settings.name: link.stopSearch.visible
settings.description: Show the 'Stop' button at the bottom of the panel. Defaults to the value of link.visible

settings.name: refresh.time.visible
settings.description: Show the refresh time indicator: default True

settings.name: refresh.link.visible
settings.description: Show the refresh link: default True

settings.name: refresh.auto.interval
settings.description: time in seconds to refresh this panel.  If not a positive integer panel will not refresh. Defaults to 0

settings.name: refresh.display
settings.description: Define how search refresh is displayed to the user in terms of showing preview data, messaging and the progressbar

settings.name: charting.chart
settings.description: Set the chart type. Defaults to column

settings.name: charting.chart.stackMode
settings.description: Used to set up stacked for area, bar, and column charts. Defaults to default

settings.name: charting.chart.nullValueMode
settings.description: Determines how the area and line charts handles null values. Defaults to gaps

settings.name: charting.chart.barSpacing
settings.description: Controls the spacing between bars in a bar chart

settings.name: charting.chart.columnSpacing
settings.description: Controls the spacing between bars in a column chart

settings.name: height
settings.description: The height of the chart

settings.name: charting.axisTitleX.text
settings.description: Specifies the title of the X-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisTitleY.text
settings.description: Specifies the title of the Y-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisTitleY2.text
settings.description: Specifies the title of the Y2-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisTitleX.visibility
settings.description: Indicates whether to show the title of the X-Axis. Defaults to visible

settings.name: charting.axisTitleY.visibility
settings.description: Indicates whether to show the title of the Y-Axis. Defaults to visible

settings.name: charting.axisTitleY2.visibility
settings.description: Indicates whether to show the title of the Y2-Axis. Defaults to visible

settings.name: charting.seriesColors
settings.description: Colors used for the series. The format is a JSON array like: [0xFF0000,0xFFFF00,0x00FF00]

settings.name: charting.resultTruncationLimit
settings.description: The default used depends on your browser and the chart type being used

settings.name: charting.chart.resultTruncationLimit
settings.description: The default used depends on your browser and the chart type being used

settings.name: charting.layout.splitSeries
settings.description: This is a special switch that splits a multi-series chart into separate charts

settings.name: charting.layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges
settings.description: Specifies whether to allow split series charts to have independent y-ranges. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.gaugeColors
settings.description: Colors used for the gauges. The format is a JSON array like: [0xFF0000,0xFFFF00,0x00FF00]

settings.name: charting.fieldColors
settings.description: Colors used for each field. The format is a JSON array like: [0xFF0000,0xFFFF00,0x00FF00]

settings.name: charting.lineDashStyle
settings.description: Dash style for all line series in the chart. Defaults to solid. Applies for line chart

settings.name: charting.data.count
settings.description: The number of results to retrieve. Set 0 to get all results

settings.name: charting.data.fieldListMode
settings.description: The order in which to apply the fieldShowList and fieldHideList filters. Defaults to hide_show

settings.name: charting.data.fieldShowList
settings.description: The list of fields to explicitly show in the results. JSON array format

settings.name: charting.data.fieldHideList
settings.description: The list of fields to explicitly hide from the results. JSON array format

settings.name: charting.axisY2.enabled
settings.description: Enables a second Y-Axis for chart overlays. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisY2.fields
settings.description: Specify a field or a space/comma-delimited list of fields that should be mapped to the second Y-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisY.scale
settings.description: For numeric axes Y, this represents the type of scale that Splunk applies to a numerical axis

settings.name: charting.axisY2.scale
settings.description: For numeric axes Y2, this represents the type of scale that Splunk applies to a numerical axis

settings.name: charting.axisY.maximumNumber
settings.validate: validate( isnum(value) OR match(value, "^(auto)$"), "Value of argument 'axisY.maximumNumber' must be either a number or 'auto'")

settings.name: charting.axisX.scale
settings.description: For numeric axes X, this represents the type of scale that Splunk applies to a numerical axis

settings.name: charting.axisX.includeZero
settings.description: Determines whether chart's X-Axis range includes zero. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisY.includeZero
settings.description: Determines whether chart's Y-Axis range includes zero. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisY2.includeZero
settings.description: Determines whether chart's Y2-Axis range includes zero. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.majorLabelVisibility
settings.description: Controls the visibility of the major tick mark labels of X-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation
settings.description: Determines the rotation of the axis label in degrees. Defaults to 0

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode
settings.description: Determines whether the axis label is ellipsized to the tick spacing. Defaults to ellipsisNone

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.integerUnits
settings.description: Indicates whether the major unit should be rounded to the nearest integer. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.majorLabelVisibility
settings.description: Controls the visibility of the major tick mark labels of Y-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.majorLabelVisibility
settings.description: Controls the visibility of the major tick mark labels of Y2-Axis

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.axisVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether or not X-Axis line is visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.axisVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether or not Y-Axis line is visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.axisVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether or not Y2-Axis line is visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.majorTickVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether major tick marks on the X-Axis are visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.majorTickVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether major tick marks on the Y-Axis are visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.majorTickVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether major tick marks on the Y2-Axis are visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.minorTickVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether minor tick marks on the X-Axis are visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.minorTickVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether minor tick marks on the Y-Axis are visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.minorTickVisibility
settings.description: Determines whether minor tick marks on the Y2-Axis are visible

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.majorTickSize
settings.description: Determines the size in pixels of major tick marks on the X-Axis. Defaults to 6

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.majorTickSize
settings.description: Determines the size in pixels of major tick marks on the Y-Axis. Defaults to 6

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.majorTickSize
settings.description: Determines the size in pixels of major tick marks on the Y2-Axis. Defaults to 6

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.minorTickSize
settings.description: Determines the size in pixels of minor tick marks on the X-Axis. Defaults to 6

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.minorTickSize
settings.description: Determines the size in pixels of minor tick marks on the Y-Axis. Defaults to 6

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.minorTickSize
settings.description: Determines the size in pixels of minor tick marks on the Y2-Axis. Defaults to 6

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.extendsAxisRange
settings.description: Determines whether the Y-Axis should be extended to snap to whole major tick marks. Defaults to true

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY.integerUnits
settings.description: Determines whether the major unit of Y-Axis is rounded to the nearest integer. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsY2.integerUnits
settings.description: Determines whether the major unit of second Y-Axis is rounded to the nearest integer. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.axisLabelsX.extendsAxisRange
settings.description: Extend the axis range of the X-Axis to show the first tickmark out of range. Only applies for numeric axis values. Defaults to true

settings.name: charting.gridLinesX.showMajorLines
settings.description: Determines whether major grid lines on X-Axis are visible. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.gridLinesY.showMajorLines
settings.description: Determines whether major grid lines on Y-Axis are visible. Defaults to true

settings.name: charting.gridLinesY2.showMajorLines
settings.description: Determines whether major grid lines on the second Y-Axis are visible. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.gridLinesX.showMinorLines
settings.description: Determines whether minor grid lines are visible on the X-axis. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.gridLinesY.showMinorLines
settings.description: Determines whether minor grid lines are visible on the Y-axis. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.gridLinesY2.showMinorLines
settings.description: Determines whether minor grid lines are visible on the second Y-Axis. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.legend.labels
settings.description: A list of labels with which to pre-populate the legend

settings.name: charting.legend.placement
settings.descripton: Location of legend on the panel. Defaults to right

settings.name: charting.legend.labelStyle.overflowMode
settings.descripton: Determines how to display labels of legend that overflow layout bounds by replacing elided text with an ellipsis (...)

settings.name: charting.legend.masterLegend
settings.descripton: If attribute is present, disables legend color synchronization with other panels in the dashboard. The only valid value is an empty tag. If a value is specified, the attribute is ignored

settings.name: charting.drilldown
settings.descripton: Enable or disable drilldown for the chart. Defaults to all

settings.name: charting.chart.showLines
settings.description: Indicates whether or not lines should be painted in area charts

settings.name: charting.chart.style
settings.description: Enables the choice between two basic gauge appearances. The shiny style is a graphically stylized version of the gauge with with chrome, shading, and so on so that it mimics those in the real world. The minimal style is a stripped-down "just the basics" version of the gauge.

settings.name: charting.chart.rangeValues
settings.description: A numeric array that represents the overall numerical range represented by the gauge, and the relative size of the color-coded subranges within that overall range. For example, a range of [0,30,70,100] would indicate that the gauge starts at zero, ends at 100, and has three subranges that are each identified by another filler color. If the search returns a value of 71, the filler rises to that value on the gauge and takes on the color assigned to the top range (71-100).

settings.name: charting.chart.showLabels
settings.description: Determines whether pie or gauge should display labels

settings.name: charting.chart.showDataLabels
settings.description: Determines whether line, column, bar or area should display labels

settings.name: charting.chart.showValue
settings.description: Determines whether the gauge should show its value

settings.name: charting.chart.showMarkers
settings.description: Indicates whether or not markers should be painted in line charts

settings.name: charting.chart.markerSize
settings.description: Determines the scatter chart's marker size. Defaults to 4

settings.name: charting.chart.usePercentageRange
settings.description: Determines whether the gauge uses percentage range. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.chart.usePercentageValue
settings.description: Determines whether the gauge uses percentage value. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.chart.rangeStartAngle
settings.description: Determines the radial gauge's range start angle. Defaults to 45

settings.name: charting.chart.rangeArcAngle
settings.description: Determines the radial gauge's range arc angle. Defaults to 270

settings.name: charting.chart.showRangeBand
settings.description: Determines whether the gauge shows a color band (applies to radial and marker gauges)

settings.name: charting.chart.majorUnit
settings.description: Determines the gauge's major unit

settings.name: charting.chart.showMajorTicks
settings.description: Determines whether the gauge shows major ticks. Defaults to true

settings.name: charting.chart.showMinorTicks
settings.description: Determines whether the gauge shows minor ticks. Defaults to false for radial gauge and true for filler and marker gauges

settings.name: charting.chart.orientation
settings.description: Determines the markerGauge or fillerGauge orientation. Defaults to y

settings.name: charting.chart.seriesSpacing
settings.description: Determines in pixels the spacing between clustered series in column and bar charts

settings.name: charting.chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold
settings.description: Determines the pie chart's threshold at which smaller slices collapse into a consolidated slice

settings.name: charting.chart.sliceCollapsingLabel
settings.description: Determines the pie chart's label for the consolidated slice. Defaults to Other

settings.name: charting.chart.showPercent
settings.description: Determines whether to display percentage values with the labels. Defaults to false

settings.name: charting.chart.overlayFields
settings.description: Specify a field or a space/comma-delimited list of fields that should be overlaid

settings.name: charting.areaFillOpacity
settings.description: The opacity of the filled region in an area chart

settings.name: charting.chart.bubbleMaximumSize
settings.description: Determines the maximum size of each bubble. Defaults to 50

settings.name: charting.chart.bubbleMinimumSize
settings.description: Determines the minimum size of each bubble. Defaults to 10

settings.name: charting.chart.bubbleSizeBy
settings.description: Determines whether bubble size is set by area or diameter. Defaults to area

settings.name: charting.backgroundColor
settings.description: Colors used for background

settings.name: charting.foregroundColor
settings.description: Colors used for foreground

settings.name: charting.fontColor
settings.description: Colors used for font axis labels, legends

settings.name: count
settings.description: Number of rows to display. Defaults to 10

settings.name: rowNumbers
settings.description: Enable or disable the row numbers column in the results table. Defaults to false

settings.name: overlay
settings.description: Indicates which type of overlay to display. Defaults to none

settings.name: totalsRow
settings.description: Enable or disable the totals summary row in the results table. Defaults to false

settings.name: percentagesRow
settings.description: Enable or disable the percentages summary row in the results table. Defaults to false

settings.name: showPager
settings.description: Toggle pagination on or off. Defaults to true

settings.name: drilldown
settings.description: Enables drilldown on row or cell level, or disables drilldown. Defaults to cell

settings.name: fields
settings.description: The list of fields to display in the table

settings.name: fields
settings.description: The list of fields to display in the table

settings.name: wrap
settings.description: Enable or disable wrapping of text in the results table. Defaults to true

settings.name: mapping.type
settings.description: The type of map to render.  Allowed values are "marker" and "choropleth".  Default is "marker".

settings.name: mapping.data.maxClusters
settings.description: The maximum number of clusters to render. Use caution when setting this property, as rendering a large number of clusters can significantly degrade performance. It's recommended to use values below 1000. The default value is 100

settings.name: mapping.fieldColors
settings.description: {<field>:<hex>,...,<field>:<hex>} - A map of field names to hexadecimal color values (0xRRGGBB) to define colors for specific series. The default value is none.

settings.name: mapping.seriesColors
settings.description: [<hex>,...,<hex>] - A list of hexadecimal color values (0xRRGGBB) from which to sample colors for series with no specific colors assigned via the fieldColors property. The default value is

settings.name: mapping.map.center
settings.description: (<latitude>,<longitude>) - The initial center point of the map. Latitude values can range from -85 to 85, with values outside of this range being clipped. Longitude values can range from -180 to 180, with values outside of this range being wrapped to fall within it. The default value is none (auto).

settings.name: mapping.map.zoom
settings.description: The initial zoom level of the map

settings.name: mapping.map.scrollZoom
settings.description: Whether or not a mouse scroll will zoom the map. The default is false

settings.name: mapping.map.panning
settings.description: Whether or not a user can pan the map. The default is true

settings.name: mapping.map.fitBounds
settings.description: (<south-latitude>,<west-longitude>,<north-latitude>,<east-longitude>) - The initial bounds to fit within the map view area. Latitude values can range from -85 to 85, with values outside of this range being clipped. Longitude values can range from -180 to 180, with values outside of this range being wrapped to fall within it. Values assigned to this property effectively override any values assigned to the center or zoom properties. The default value is none (auto).

settings.name: mapping.showTiles
settings.description: Determines whether the map tiles are shown.  The default is true.

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.tileOpacity
settings.description: The opacity of the tiles. Values can range from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque). The default value is 1.

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.url
settings.description: The url template to use for requesting tiles. The template can contain {x}, {y}, {z}, and {s} tokens to be replaced with the x coordinate, y coordinate, zoom level, and subdomain, respectively, for each tile. The default value is currently http://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png (likely to change before release).

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.subdomains
settings.description: [<string>,...,<string>] - A list of subdomains to distribute tile requests over. More subdomains allows more tiles to be requested simultaneously. The default value is [a,b,c]

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.minZoom
settings.description: The minimum zoom level of the tileset. The default value is 0

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.maxZoom
settings.description: The maximum zoom level of the tileset. The default value is currently 7

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.invertY
settings.description: Whether to invert the y coordinate for tile requests (TMS servers use inverse y-axis numbering). The default value is false

settings.name: mapping.tileLayer.attribution
settings.description: A copyright attribution to be displayed in the bottom right corner of the map. The default value is currently Map data (c) 2012 OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.colorMode
settings.description: The color mode to use for the choropleth shapes. Possible modes are 'sequential', 'divergent', or 'categorical'. If set to 'auto', the mode will be chosen by inspecting the data. The default is 'auto'.

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.maximumColor
settings.description: The color to use for the highest value shapes. The default is 0xDB5800.

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.minimumColor
settings.description: Only used when the color mode is divergent. The color to use for the lowest value shapes. The default is 0x2F25BA.

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.colorBins
settings.description: The number of color bins to use. The default 5.

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.neutralPoint
settings.description: Only used when the color mode is divergent. The value where the color palette should switch from using the minimum color to the maximum color. The default 0.

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.shapeOpacity
settings.description: The opacity of the shapes. Values can range from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque). The default value is 0.75.

settings.name: mapping.choroplethLayer.showBorder
settings.description: Whether to show borders around each shape. The default value is true.

settings.name: mapping.markerLayer.markerOpacity
settings.description: The opacity of the markers. Values can range from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque). The default value is 0.8

settings.name: mapping.markerLayer.markerMinSize
settings.description: The minimum size of the markers, in pixels. The default value is 10

settings.name: mapping.markerLayer.markerMaxSize
settings.description: The maximum size of the markers, in pixels. The default value is 50

settings.name: mapping.legend.placement
settings.description: The placement of the map legend. The default value is 'bottomright'

settings.name: height
settings.description: Determines the map's height

settings.name: drilldown
settings.description: Enable drilldown for the map. Defaults to all

settings.name: additionalClass
settings.description: Static class added to containing div

settings.name: linkView
settings.description: Target view which user is redirected to when clicking on the result

settings.name: field
settings.description: field that holds the value to display

settings.name: linkFields
settings.description: CSV list containing: result, beforelabel, underlabel, afterlabel turning that portion into a link

settings.name: classField
settings.description: additional class added to containing div based on the field specified

settings.name: unit
settings.description: label that represents unit for single value

settings.name: unitPosition
settings.description: option that determines if unit appears before or after single value

settings.name: beforeLabel
settings.description: label that appears to the left of the value

settings.name: afterLabel
settings.description: label that appears to the right of the value

settings.name: underLabel
settings.description: label that appears below the value

settings.name: colorMode
settings.description: The display style of the background element

settings.name: rangeValues
settings.description: An array of range limits for different severities

settings.name: rangeColors
settings.description: An array of color hex values to map to rangeValues

settings.name: trendInterval
settings.description: A relative time modifier that indicates time amount in past to calculate the delta value from

settings.name: trendColorInterpretation
settings.description: The display mode for the trend indicator - whether a positive metric signifies a positive development or not

settings.name: showTrendIndicator
settings.description: A boolean flag whether or not to show the trend indicator

settings.name: showSparkline
settings.description: A boolean flag whether or not to show the sparkline

settings.name: trendDisplayMode
settings.description: The formatting for the trend indicator - whether the trend amount is displayed as a percentage or an absolute count

settings.name: colorBy
settings.description: A boolean flag whether to color by the range value or trend indicator

settings.name: useColors
settings.description: A boolean flag whether or not to show colors

settings.name: numberPrecision
settings.description: How many decimal places to display in the single result label

settings.name: useThousandSeparators
settings.description: A boolean flag whether or not to show thousand separators in the single result label

settings.name: linkSearch
settings.description: optional search that is passed to the linked view

settings.name: drilldown
settings.description: enable or disable automatic drilldown for the single value visualization. By default it is disabled ("none") for backwards compatibility.

settings.name: count
settings.description: The maximum number of rows to display

settings.name: rowNumbers
settings.description: Toggle display of row numbers to the left of results. Defaults to false. Supports for "type": "list" and "table"

settings.name: entityName
settings.description: Toggle whether to show events or results. Events are individual events, while results are created by statistical operators. Defaults to events

settings.name: maxLines
settings.description: The maximum number of lines to display for each result/event

settings.name: showPager
settings.description: Toggle pagination on or off

settings.name: segmentation
settings.description: Set the segmentation of events displayed. This affects what you can and can't click on within the event. This only applies to raw and list event panel types

settings.name: softWrap
settings.description: Enables wrapping of events. Defaults to true

settings.name: type
settings.description: Indicates the format for displaying events. Defaults to list

settings.name: drilldown
settings.description: A "virtual" option to bulk-set all of the type-specific drilldown options. Enabling this causes the default values for the following settings to change (<segmentation> is the value of the segementation option):

settings.name: raw.drilldown
settings.description: Specifies how drilldown operates in the raw event listing. Defaults to full

settings.name: list.drilldown
settings.description: Specifies how drilldown operates in the list event listing. Defaults to full

settings.name: table.drilldown
settings.description: Specifies how drilldown operates in the table event listing. Defaults to all

settings.name: list.wrap
settings.description: Indicates whether to wrap the contents of the event listing. Defaults to true

settings.name: table.wrap
settings.description: Indicates whether text in the table wraps. Defaults to true

settings.name: table.sortColumn
settings.description: Specifies the column on which to sort for the table

settings.name: table.sortDirection
settings.description: Indicates the sort direction for items in the table. Defaults to asc

settings.name: fields
settings.description: The list of fields to display

settings.name: base
settings.description: Reference to the base search

settings.name: type
settings.description: Specifies the type of sparkline. Defaults to line

settings.name: autoRun
settings.description: Indicates whether to run the search when the page loads. Defaults to false

settings.name: submitButton
settings.description: Indicates whether to display a Submit button. Defaults to true
